Synopsis: Displays a table visualization of the input object.
Description: The Show-TableVisualization function displays a table visualization of the input object using Format-Table. It also provides additional information about the table data.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-Process | Show-TableVisualization
Displays a table visualization of the processes retrieved by Get-Process.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
$data = Get-Service | Where-Object { $_.Status -eq 'Running' } | Select-Object Name, DisplayName, Status
PS C:\> $data | Show-TableVisualization
Displays a table visualization of the selected service data.
